title: Is Karan Johar blaming himself for Sanjay Leela Bhansali slapgate incident on Padmavati sets? - Bollywoodlife.com
text: Is Karan Johar blamingâ€¦ Is Karan Johar blaming himself for Sanjay Leela Bhansali slapgate incident on Padmavati sets? Karan Johar has penned yet another column, where the Ae Dil Hai Mushkil director talks about his much talked about apology video. Karan describes his ordeal and reveals that he felt like a "hostage" who had to prove his "nationalism". By Rashma Shetty Bali | Published: January 31, 2017 4:24 pm
